website_summaries.verdict: The EOS M10 is another underwhelming mirrorless camera from Canon. There are better options available.
pros: Adapter available for Canon SLR lenses

customer_reviews.title: I could not be happier with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Amazing resolution and endless modes of photographing. Me as amateur, it is a brilliant camera to point and shoot (as well try more advanced pictures). the size and weight it is just perfect for travelling and weekend shooting
customer_reviews.author: Founar

customer_reviews.title: Amazing camera, perfect for a newbie blogger
customer_reviews.text: Amazing camera, perfect for a newbie blogger, the flip screen gives great opportunity when shooting outside, the photos are clear and easy to read and the camera is easy to programme. Will be buying a new lens. Should be noted that it does not come with a memory card.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Powlett

customer_reviews.title: Good for the Weight of it.
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice lightweight camera for taking on holiday. I usually use a bigger SLR so this is not quite as good but for the weight and size it works well enough. I had trouble trying to get Photoshop to open the raw files from this camera, so I had to download some software from Canon. The Auto white balance is not that good and you have to set it tungsten when you are indoors, which is a bit sad really as most cameras can cope reasonably well without doing that. Getting it to talk to my phone is not as easy as the instructions would have you believe.
customer_reviews.author: Bev

customer_reviews.title: Really love the remote photo taking
customer_reviews.text: As a beginner I may not be able to utilise all the functions, but its a nifty little camera. Really love the remote photo taking, so you can set the camera up and take photos from a distance using your phone. Really quick and easy to get photos onto your phone as well for easy uploads to your social media of choice. Some fun filters, but perhaps not necessary as a lot of photo editing is best done afterwards. It also looks really great! I just need my photography skills to match the cameras abilities now.
customer_reviews.author: Eve

customer_reviews.title: A amazing camera for a amazing price.
customer_reviews.text: A amazing camera for a amazing price. Excelente quality in a small size camera! Great for traveling and everyday photos.
customer_reviews.author: Renan Clementino

customer_reviews.title: Super pleased!!
customer_reviews.text: So glad i purchased this camera, arrived on time and well packaged! It takes a bit of getting use to if you're not used to a high performance camera but the quality is incredible!
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: For a person with a fear of complicated kit this is fantastic. As easy or complicated as you want. Great for product photography. Lovely weight/ look. Love it
customer_reviews.author: fr

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: I found I wasnt using my Canon SLR because of its weight esp when combined with lenses etc. so I purchased this with two lenses. Very pleased with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Hydeparker

customer_reviews.title: A perfect point-and-shoot camera
customer_reviews.text: With the 22 mm lens (equals a 35 mm lens on an old-fashioned 24x36 mm camera) it is the perfect camera for snapshots. With adapters, it will also accept the whole range of Canon EOS lenses and even the FD lens range. Then you have to use the touch screen, which is a bit tricky.
customer_reviews.author: Hans Aili

customer_reviews.title: It's a very good Camera. As I was not in favor of ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a very good Camera. As I was not in favor of bulky DSLR's, I wanted something compact and didn't want to overspend. This camera certainly has ticked all the boxes. EF-M lens ensures sharp images. I might look for non-EOS M lens 6 month to 1 year down the line using lens adapter.
customer_reviews.author: Amit

customer_reviews.title: Good small mirrorless
customer_reviews.text: It's very light and easy to use. Its a good small camera and picture quality is OK, of course not to be compared with a full frame, but I like the colouring. Its kept very simple.
customer_reviews.author: GV

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Great value for money, great shots and easy to connect your phone to send photos would recommend! I doubt the new model is much different
customer_reviews.author: GGill

customer_reviews.title: This must be about as good as it gets
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something a bit more compact than my DSLR but without any compromise on picture quality. This must be about as good as it gets.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Great camera just what I wanted, Use for youtube and family pics
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice camera, focus could be better but can get used to!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: picture perfect
customer_reviews.text: takes a great photo...loads of great features. it isnt a pro model but are you a pro?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice camera. A good compact alternative to my SLR.
customer_reviews.author: MARTIN F

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera. TKes great photos without the weight of an slr.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Drake

customer_reviews.title: a new hobby - great!
customer_reviews.text: I love the way I can change from auto settings to something a bit more sophisticated; close-ups, landscape etc. The camera does do more than this and using it and seeing the results makes me want to learn more. Very light (I bought a neoprene case) and easy to use. Switch off the screen activated auto-shoot: I ended up with loads of blurry pics while walking as it bounced around on my stomach so spend some time learning to use all the menus.
customer_reviews.author: andyhol

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: A good camera for a beginner. Still trying to figure out what's what but enjoying the process. Got it as a foot into photography and will see how it goes over the year and got it g or a decent price too.
customer_reviews.author: K. Daire

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bit of kit!
customer_reviews.text: Just to agree with what's been said in other positive reviews, it's a really nice little camera. High quality build, great features, and the shots it produces are amazing. Plus I got £30 cashback from Canon. Bargain! :)
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Burns

customer_reviews.title: brilliant little camera to go along side my 7d and ...
customer_reviews.text: brilliant little camera to go along side my 7d and xc10 when i dont want a big camera. full of great gadgets and features you can even get an adapter to put EOS lenses on it. so versitile. good quailty as you would expect from canon.
customer_reviews.author: A G

customer_reviews.title: Canon EOS M10
customer_reviews.text: This camera replaces my Large DSLR camera I wont go into specifications but Its light - compact - and easy to use with 3 settings If you just want a quality camera that takes a great picture in Jpeg and or RAW with good video and can be controlled with a phone I choose this canon. The flash is femma that's the only issue and I use my finger to slow down the flash on jumping out the camera top good battery life over 200 + shots on 1 battery charge - Its small and light that's the selling point and have use it on holiday I rate this camera at a good price on purchase
customer_reviews.author: sedov

customer_reviews.title: Nice compact lightweight SLR-type camera with many features and high ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice compact lightweight SLR-type camera with many features and high quality images
customer_reviews.author: Val Perrin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant portable camera. Better than I thought for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Blagden's Ideas

customer_reviews.title: DSLR quality in a pocket size.
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera. Photo quality compares well to full size DSLR. Movie characteristics are excellent too, except auto focus which is slower than expected and struggles in low light. Overall, its an excellent buy and a great all-day companion. Price is good too, for a Canon.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Gauci

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: I'm still testing it, looks good but I don't know if i prefer the M3
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed that Canon refused to offer the £30 refund promised ...
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed that Canon refused to offer the £30 refund promised vai other suppliers, as we paid full price and the product was brand new felt this was not really fair, very good camera though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this camera: Great for vlogging & photography
customer_reviews.text: Amazing camera! I brought this camera for blogging on youtube and taking high quality pictures and i can say i have not been disappointed. When i was searching for cameras, it seemed the only high spec cameras i could purchase came with a big price tag.. until i phone the canon eos M10. I would highly recommend this camera for anyone want to become a blog, make videos or take phones. The touch screen and tilt screen are a bonus too! You won't be disappointed with this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little monster!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing camera! DSLR image quality in a small package examined. I own a bigger DSLR, but as they say, the best camera is the one did is always with you, and that's exactly what happened with this :) It's so beautiful it makes me wanna photograph things all the time. Modern specs, wifi, nfc, mobile apps, tilting high-res touchscreen and superb functions , Only minus for no in-camera timelapse, but thankfully it's possible with pc software
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Kunde

product_meta.title: Canon EOS M10 DSLR Camera with EF-M 15-45 mm f/3.5-6.3 IS STM Lens - Black
product_meta.description:
Style Name:EF-M 15-45 mm f/3.5-6.3 IS STM Lens| Colour Name:BlackTake your first step into interchangeable lens photography with simplicity in front of you and the power of Canon behind you. A compact system camera that combines DSLR performance with effortless portability.

BOX CONTAINS
Digital Camera EOS M10 bodyEF-M 15-45mm f/3.5-6.3 IS STMLens Cap E-49Lens Dust Cap EBCamera Cover R-F-4Strap EM-200DBBattery Charger LC-E12EPower CableBattery Pack LP-E12Terminal CoverInterface Cable IFC-400PCUUser Manual Kit
feature_bullets: DSLR power in a compact mirrorless camera that's easy to carry. Swap lenses and take a different view
HIgh quality and easy operation with an intuitive tilt-up touchscreen and creative assist to experiment with settings
Shoot remotely and share instantly via your smartphone. Easily back up your images to cloud services
Versatile wide-angle zoom lens for shooting everything from wide-angle landscapes to portraits with beautiful background blur
Easy-to-carry, compact, lightweight body with collapsible design the ideal companion for the EOS M. Recording Media: SD Memory card, SDHC Memory card, SDXC Memory card

specifications.Style: EF-M 15-45 mm f/3.5-6.3 IS STM Lens
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars60 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
